_header: This day Saint Matthew tells us
Note: For the version in the ‘expanded’ Cycle see 4727.
_description: Gospel for Twentieth Sunday after Trinity, in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodAsh42.First Lines:
TO daye saynte mathew tellis vsþat to þe folk ones saide
                    iesus…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…Gretinge ȝamirynge & tethe gnaistingeI rede þat
                    we be warr for thi
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
TO day seint Matheu telleþ vsÞat to þe folk spac
                    Ihesus…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…But fewe beo chosun to comen þer toffor fewe men don as
                    þei schulde do
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
Simile est Regnum celorum homini Regi (f.
                    211rc)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
Þis day Seynt Matheu telles vsÞat til þe folk spak
                    ihesus…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…Of þi halowes þat are in heueneÞat loues
                    þe with þeire mery steuene
CULAdd8335.Attributed Title:
Dominica xxa post festum trinitatis secundum Mathium (p.
                    327)

CULDd11.First Lines:
SEynt Mathew þis day telliþ vsþat to þe folk
                    spak ihesusand seyde to hem þat heuene riche…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…of þin halewis þat arn in heueneþat worschipe
                    the with hire mery steuene
CULDd11.Attributed Title:
Dominica vicesima post festum sancte trinitatis Euangelium secundum
                        Mathium Simile est regnum celorum homini regi qui fecit nupcias &
                        cetera (f. 200)

CULGg531.First Lines:
Þis day seynt Matheu telles vsþat tyll þe folk sayd
                    ihesusHe sayd tyl þam þat heue rykeYs til a werldes kyng
                    lyke…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…Bot foue er chosen to come þare toffor foue wyll lyf als
                    þai suld do

BLAdd22283.First Lines:
TO day seint Matheu telles vsÞat to þe folke spac
                    Ihesus…
BLAdd22283.Last Lines:
…But few beo chosun to comen þertoffor fewe men don as
                    þei schuld do
BLAdd22283.Attributed Title: Simile est regum celorum homini regi (f. 15va)
BLAdd22283.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library MS Add. 22283 (‘Simeon’).
         2014; http://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/FullDisplay.aspx?ref=Add_MS_22283.

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
To day saynt mathewe tellys vsIn to þe folke Anes sayd
                    Ihesus…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…To þis bridale er þai caldeffor þai for
                    cristen men er talde…

MinULZ822.First Lines:
To day sante mathew telles vsþat tyll þe folke spake
                    Ihesusand sayde tyll þame þat heuen ryke…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…Oure lorde Ihesu teche vs þat wayVnto þat Ioy
                    þat lastes ay

HunHM129.First Lines:
To day seint mathew tellyth vsÞat to þe folk spak
                    ihesus…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…Bot few be chossyn to cum þare toffor few men lyuyth as
                    þay schold do
